title: (x) Massimo Cacciari humanist sans - ITC Officina {Raph, Erik}
content:
Can someone tell me what this typeface is? Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [typeidplease.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120927043412/http:/typophile.com/files/typeidplease.jpg) | 55.63 KB |
author: TGaskin

comments.content: ITC Officina. Easy: I designed it.
Thank you, it's a beautiful typeface.

Nice meeting you Erik.

That face was a Tony Greco staple - I don't think he could as a designer have lived without it. Thank you. (Tony was [is] a wonderful designer and was known throughout the publishing word as the master of the small space...)
